### **Project Details**

The government of Canada, represented by Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is seeking bids for the provision of a Bulk Argon System.

The project involves the installation of approximately 800 meters of Argon piping infrastructure, including materials and equipment to support the transportation of Argon gas from the main tank to the 4th and 7th floors of the main building.

The contractor shall provide all necessary labor, materials, and equipment to complete the project. The scope of work includes the installation of mechanical systems, coordination with building management, and delivery of the project within a specified timeframe.

A site visit is mandatory for respondents.
